thread.title: Deutsche Bank reports third consecutive annual loss

title: Deutsche Bank reports third consecutive annual loss
text:
Deutsche Bank reports third consecutive annual loss 8:03am EST - 01:46 
Deutsche Bank has posted its third consecutive annual loss in 2017, taking a hit from challenging markets, a drop in investment bank revenue and a U.S. tax reform, after a difficult fourth quarter. David Pollard reports.
